free.description: Your trial period is valid for 1 month and does not require entering any payment information upfront. If you start today, <0>{{yourFreeTrialTrans}}</0> will last until <1>{{dateTrans}}</1>.

summary.ifEuVatIsFilledIn: If EU VAT ID is filled in, it will be indicated on the invoice. If you enter your valid EU VAT ID, special taxation rules apply.

tooltip.webLicenses: Each Project Manager license includes 5 additional free web licenses. Free web licenses enable your users to access your cloud server from the memoQWeb browser-based application.
